subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Josh Hamilton, a five-time All-Star with the Rangers, is hitting only .222 with 8 home runs, 18 R.B.I. and a .283 on-base percentage for the Angels, while his old team thrives without him.
snippet: Josh Hamilton, a five-time All-Star with the Rangers, is hitting only .222 with 8 home runs, 18 R.B.I. and a .283 on-base percentage for the Angels, while his old team thrives without him.
